name: Last Words (axi*, mardt)
description:
After your death, the mysteries of your forefathers still haunt you - what better way to find out by beating their ghosts out of existence by erasing their names? (it makes perfect sense don't question it)

Fight your enemies with words.

Heavy randomization makes each playthrough different!

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2023, at the University of Arts Utrecht

Currently has quite a few bugs - hoping to fix these later after the jam!
